description: If checked, the 1st invoice from this order should be a deposit invoice.
label: Desposit on 1st Invoice
name: Sales Order-has_deposit

description: Deposit deduction (return of deposit) on following invoice(s).
label: Deposit Deduction Method
name: Sales Order-deposit_deduction_method

label: Thai Tax Information / ข้อมูลภาษีไทย

name: Sales Invoice-thai_invoice_type

Tax Invoice
Cash Receipt
Credit Note
Debit Note

description: 5-digit branch code (00000 for head office)

label: Tax Compliance / การปฏิบัติตามกฎหมายภาษี

label: Subject to Withholding Tax
name: Quotation-subject_to_wht

description: Primary authorized signatory for company documents
label: Authorized Signature 1

None
Original
Copy
Draft
Submitted
Ordered
Expired
Duplicate

name: Company-construction_service

description: Enable Thailand withholding tax features for service businesses

description: Watermark text to display on printed document

options:
None
Original
Copy
Draft

Duplicate

name: Sales Invoice-watermark_text
options:

Original
Copy
